original_text: For salaried employees, the system will calculate gross pay based on their annual salary divided by the number of pay periods in a year.

original_text: Security best practices for Kubernetes should be implemented, including network policies to control communication between services, Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) to manage access to cluster resources, and regular security patching of the Kubernetes infrastructure to address any vulnerabilities.

original_text: To effectively manage inter-service communication within the microservices architecture, a service mesh will be implemented.

original_text: The service mesh will provide valuable insights into the performance and health of the microservices through detailed metrics, distributed tracing, and comprehensive logging, facilitating faster troubleshooting and improved system reliability.
